title: Interesting interaction between Braum and Ornn Brittle
body:
https://plays.tv/video/5aad774d3d3bf836ae/how-did-i-get-that-



So I got this kill on Braum and I had no idea why but after a while of looking at it I think my friends and I figured it out. Don't quote me on this but I'm pretty sure the proc of brittle activated the last tick of braum passive to get me the kill. I just thought it was interesting how the kill went to me rather than other people on the team. This is something that I have never seen on league before.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Sedonis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VMdqBnsf,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-03-17T22:21:29.389+0000)
> 
>  I&#039;m pretty sure the proc of brittle activated the last tick of braum passive to get me the kill. 

You said that backwards The last tick of braum passive acrivated brittle. Since its your stun its your brittle damage. 

Working as intended.

> [{quoted}](name=GigglesO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=VMdqBnsf,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-03-18T04:47:41.548+0000)
>
> You said that backwards The last tick of braum passive acrivated brittle. Since its your stun its your brittle damage. 
> 
> Working as intended.

Hey, man, he said don't quote him on that.
it's true. I got the basic concept of it. lul
